iana.template_text:
(registered 2021-06-22, last updated 2021-06-22)

Media type name: application

Media subtype name: manifest+json

Required parameters: N/A

Optional parameters: N/A

Encoding considerations: binary

   Same as for application/json (RFC 7159, Section 8.1).

Security considerations: Please see

   https://www.w3.org/TR/appmanifest/#priv-sec

Interoperability considerations: Same as RFC 7159 and those outlined 
   in the specification itself.

Published specification:

   https://www.w3.org/TR/appmanifest/

Applications which use this media: Web Browsers

Fragment identifier considerations: N/A

Restrictions on usage: N/A

Additional information:

   1. Deprecated alias names for this type: N/A
   2. Magic number(s): N/A
   3. File extension(s): .webmanifest
   4. Macintosh file type code: TEXT
   5. Object Identifiers: N/A

General Comments:


Person to contact for further information:

   1. Name: Marcos Caceres
   2. Email: marcos&marcosc.com

Intended usage: Common

   As a linked resource from a web page, as part of a link 
   relationship. See https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#link-type-manifest

Author/Change controller: W3C
